entities.description: The numerical response options displayed from the survey instrument.
The count of survey responses, not adjusted for sample design.
The percentage representation of each unweighted frequency in comparison to the total.
Responses that are missing or omitted from the dataset.
The total number of valid responses collected in the survey.
Summary statistics including mean, minimum, maximum, and standard deviation derived from the responses.
FIPS county code capturing geographic location information of responses.

relationships.description: Associates a survey response option with its unweighted frequency count.
Links survey response options to their percentage representation.
Summarizes the responses collected in the survey.
Indicates the geographic location based on FIPS county code where the survey response was recorded.
